title: Source of the Nile
description: Historic site where the Nile River begins its journey north. Popular for boat rides.

title: Jinja Central Market
description: Bustling market with fresh produce, crafts, and local delicacies.

title: Mabira Forest Reserve
description: Tropical rainforest offering eco‑tours, bird watching, and canopy walks.

title: Itanda Falls
description: Spectacular rapids on the Nile, famous for white‑water rafting and scenic views.

title: Ripon Falls
description: Historic waterfall once marking the start of the Nile, now submerged but commemorated.

title: Jinja Sailing Club
description: Waterfront club offering sailing, dining, and community events.

title: Busoga Kingdom Palace
description: Cultural site showcasing Busoga heritage and royal traditions.

title: Nile Breweries
description: Major brewery producing Nile Special beer, offering guided tours.
